message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a novel learning-based evaluation metric for image captioning, which suggests that it could belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) or natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories. The proposed metric is trained using a discriminative approach, which involves data augmentation and robustness testing, indicating that it could also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) or artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed metric's correlation with human judgments, which suggests that it could also belong to the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
